  • Method Details

    • createPiece

      public static Piece createPiece(char c)
      Creates a new piece based on the provided character. The character represents the type of the piece and its color. Uppercase characters represent black pieces and lowercase characters represent white pieces.
      Parameters:
      c - the character that represents the piece
      Returns:
      the new piece

      Returns:
